yoruba: A kì í bọ òrìṣà lójú ọ̀fọ́n-ọ̀n; bó bá dalẹ́ a máa tú pẹpẹ.
gold: One does not sacrifice to a god in the presence of a house rat; otherwise, when night falls it invades the rafter shelves.
gen:
Yoruba: A kì í bọ òrìṣà lójú ọ̀fọ̀n-ọ̀n; bó bá dalẹ́ a máa tú pẹpẹ.
English: One does not worship a deity during a time of scarcity; when abundance comes, the altar will be neglected.
